mapper.update: update notifications set n_title = #{nTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pt_id = #{ptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, n_deadline = #{nDeadline,jdbcType=DATE}, n_files = #{nFiles,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, n_regTime = #{nRegtime,jdbcType=DATE}, n_upTime = #{nUptime,jdbcType=DATE}, nt_id = #{ntId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, n_content = #{nContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, n_comment = #{nComment,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where n_id = #{nId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select n_id, n_title, pt_id, n_deadline, n_files, n_regTime, n_upTime, nt_id, n_content, n_comment from notifications where n_id = #{nId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select n_id, n_title, pt_id, n_deadline, n_files, n_regTime, n_upTime, nt_id, n_content, n_comment from notifications
select n_id, n_title, pt_id, n_deadline, n_files, n_regTime, n_upTime, nt_id, n_content, n_comment from notifications where nt_id = #{ntId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select n_id, n_title, pt_id, n_deadline, n_files, n_regTime, n_upTime, nt_id, n_content, n_comment from notifications where nt_id=#{ntId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and pt_id=#{ptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
